name: LoungeflyPeter Pan: Klok Glow in the Dark Crossbodytas - Merchoid Nederland
description: Alle Disneyfans opgelet, ben jij klaar om naar nieuwe hoogten te stijgen? x20;van mode met de Loungefly Peter Pan Clock Glow in the Dark Crossbody Bag?! This bag is straight out of Never Land, and it&rsquo;s perfect for any adventure you might have planned. Whether you&rsquo;re going on a trip to the Magic Kingdom or just need a cute new accessory for your everyday life, this bag is the answer to your prayers!One look at this bag and you&rsquo;ll be transported back to your childhood. The front of the purse features an iconic scene from Peter Pan, with the Darling children flying right past Big Ben with Peter Pan himself leading the way. But wait, there&rsquo;s more! The face of the clock actually glows in the dark, so you can see the time even on the darkest of nights. Plus, the clock arms move too! It&rsquo;s like having a little piece of magic with you wherever you go.But that&rsquo;s not all folks! On the back of the bag, you&rsquo;ll see Nana the dog with the phrase "Think Happy Thoughts" written in the night sky. It&rsquo;s a subtle detail, but one that is sure to make you smile whenever you see it. And don&rsquo;t forget about the coordinating inside lining - it&rsquo;s the perfect finishing touch to an already amazing bag.Now, you may be wondering about the technical specs. Have no fear, we&rsquo;ve got you covered. This bag is made of vegan leather (polyurethane) and features applique, debossed, embroidered, and printed details. It&rsquo;s an official Disney product, so you know it&rsquo;s top quality. The gold-colored zipper hardware and blue shoulder strap are the perfect complement to the gorgeous design. The dimensions of the bag are 10" W x 7" H x 3" D (please note: width is measured across the bottom of the bag). So what are you waiting for? Add some pixie dust to your life and get the LoungeflyPeter Pan Klok Glow in the Dark Crossbody Tas vandaag! Het is perfect voor iedereen die gelooft in de kracht van gelukkige gedachten en ervan droomt om samen met Peter Pan en de rest van de bende door de lucht te vliegen. Kenmerken: - Iconische scène van Peter Pan op de voorkant van de tas - Glow-in-the-dark wijzerplaat en bewegende klokarmen - "Think Happy Thoughts" op de achterkant van de tas - Bijpassende binnenvoering - Gemaakt van veganistisch leer ( polyurethaan) - Appliqué, reliëf, geborduurde en gedrukte details - Goudkleurige ritssluiting en blauwe schouderband - Officieel gelicentieerd Disney-product - Afmetingen: 10 cm B x 7 cm H x 3 cm D (let op: de breedte wordt gemeten over de onderkant van de tas)ProductdetailsProducttype: CrossbodytasLicentie: Peter PanFabrikant:LoungeflySpecificaties Gewicht: Ongeveer 600 gram (21 ounces) Land van herkomst: China Materialen: Kunstleer (polyurethaan) SKU: WDTB2473GTIN: 671803402317
